section.p: The heavy wooden gates of the temple of Tyrnai are guarded by couple of veteran warriors - the old iron bullmen are gone. Inside, the god is represented by a stone idol of a jaguar-headed warrior. He appears to be naked.
Suddenly, a priest shouts, ‘It’s the thief! The blasphemous devil has had the nerve to return here!’
A score of warrior priests of Tyrnai boil out of the back rooms of the temple. You had better run for your life!

Roll a die.
If the score is less than or equal to your Rank, .
